content: Quality Product by Upgradezy.comMega.io / Mega.nz Cloud Storagehttps://mega.io/pricingFeatures✅ Personal Account upgrade on your own account/email.✅ 100% LEGALLY Prepaid. You can see the payment information in your order history.✅ 100% Warranty for your paid duration.✅ Monthly Plans - Minimum 3 Months Commitment.✅ Reseller Prices Available.✅ Up to 16 TB Storage = Amount of data you can store.✅ Up to 16 TB Bandwidth = Amount of data you can download using the account (Your/public data from Mega links)Plans✅ Pro Lite400 GB Storage | 1 TB BandwidthAnnual - $35 (Official Price: $55) - 20% OFF✅ Pro I2 TB Storage | 2 TB BandwidthMonthly - $7 (Official Price: $11)Yearly - $55 (Official Price: $110) - 50% OFF✅ Pro II8 TB Storage | 8 TB BandwidthMonthly - $15 (Official Price: $22)Yearly - $100 (Official Price: $220) - 55% OFF✅ Pro III16 TB Storage | 16 TB BandwidthMonthly - $20 (Official Price: $33)Yearly - $130 (Official Price: $330) - 60% OFFBuy herehttps://www.stuffsneak.com/megaSent appropriate amount according to the plan chosen above.Please note, minimum 3 months payment upfront needed for monthly plans.Once payment is done, contact me with the payment info along with your account login & password.Upgrade will be done within 12 hours (Usually within couple of hours)Contact1️⃣ Telegram: @StuffSneak (Fastest Option)2️⃣ Discord: upgradezy3️⃣ email: contact@upgradezy.com1st buyer gets PRO III Plan upgrade for just 100$ & FREE gifts!No Vouch/FREE Copies.
